LanguageData.VWE_WornRifling.label: worn rifling
LanguageData.VWE_WornRifling.description: The spiral grooves inside this weapon's barrel have been worn smooth by overuse. It is significantly less accurate at all ranges.
LanguageData.VWE_GritClogged.label: grit-clogged
LanguageData.VWE_GritClogged.description: The internal mechanism is filled with sand, dirt, or dried grease. It cycles sluggishly, significantly increasing the time between shots.
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyScrap.label: heavy scrap
LanguageData.VWE_HeavyScrap.description: This weapon has been repaired using heavy, improper scrap metal components. It is cumbersome to carry and takes much longer to aim.
LanguageData.VWE_TrainingConversion.label: training conversion
LanguageData.VWE_TrainingConversion.description: This weapon has been permanently modified to fire non-lethal blunt pellets for target practice. While it causes pain and bruising, it lacks the stopping power and penetration to be useful in a real firefight.
LanguageData.VWE_Janky.label: janky
LanguageData.VWE_Janky.description: This weapon's internal mechanisms are loose and poorly fitted. It suffers from inconsistent cycling issues, meaning the cooldown duration is completely randomized after every single burst.
